title: About me
text:
I am a first-year master student in the Gong group.
Recently I have been working on

random matrices
generalized symmetries
and their application to condensed matter physics.

I compose music as a hobby.


Current Affiliation

Gong group
Dept. of Appl. Phys., Faculty of Engineering, The University of Tokyo



Education

2020.4 - 2022.3

College of Arts and Sciences, The University of Tokyo

2022.4 - 2024.3

Dept. of Appl. Phys., School of Engineering, The University of Tokyo

2024.4 - present

Dept. of Appl. Phys., Graduate School of Engineering, The University of Tokyo




Financial Support
I am being financially supported by FoPM, WINGS Program, the University of Tokyo. I would like to take this opportunity to appreciate the support.



Contact
Please use this email adress (replace at with “＠”): haruyagi.contact at gmail.com

title: Physics
text:

Let’s wrap up the year 2024
dodecalemma
Let’s wrap up the year 2023

title: Home
text:
2024/12/17-12/19 Participated in 7th Intensive Lectures by Quantum Gravity Gatherings held at RIKEN iTHEMS.
2024/12/10 Presented at the poster session of New Trends in Condensed Matter Theory 2024 at ISSP UTokyo.

The poster can be found here.

2024/12/06 Made a presentation at the colloquium on applied physics I.

The presentation material is kept private because many parts of the presentation relied on specific references. I apologize to those who were looking forward to it.

2024/12/06 Made a presentation at the joint seminar of master students (theoretical) in the dept of applied phys.

The presentation slides can be found here.

2024/10/16 Research with Ken Mochizuki and Zongping Gong has been uploaded to arXiv: Threefold Way for Typical Entanglement
2024/09/16-09/19 Participated in The Physical Society of Japan 2024 Annual Meating held at Hokkaido university.

The presentation slides (in Japanese) can be found here.

2024/08/12-08/16 Participated in Symmetries 2024 held at the university of Oxford.
2024/04/01 Joined Gong group, dept. of appl. phys., graduate school of eng., the Univ. of Tokyo.
